properties.entry: -- 短信模板列表 SELECT c.type_name as category_name, (CASE WHEN st.type = 1 THEN '固定模板' WHEN st.type = 2 THEN '半定义模板' END) as type_name, st.* FROM sms_template st,sms_template_categories c WHERE st.category_id = c.id and st.deleted = 0 and st.enabled = 1 and (CASE WHEN now() < st.start_date THEN 1 WHEN now() < DATE_ADD(st.end_date,Interval 1 day) THEN 2 WHEN now() > DATE_ADD(st.end_date,Interval 1 day) THEN 3 END) = 2 {? AND st.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#name#),'%') ESCAPE '/' } {? AND st.content LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#content#),'%') ESCAPE '/' }
